mapper.sql: a.id, a.title, a.request_uri, a.content, a.create_time, a.create_user, a.user_agent, a.exception, a.ramek
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM bug_log a WHERE 1 = 1
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{beginDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND a.title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%' CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%')
AND a.create_user = #{createUser}
AND a.request_uri LIKE '%'||#{requestUri}||'%' CONCAT('%', #{requestUri}, '%')
ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
SELECT * FROM bug_log a WHERE a.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bug_log( id, title, request_uri, content, create_user, create_time, user_agent, exception, ramek ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{title}, #{requestUri}, #{content}, #{createUser}, SYSDATE(), #{userAgent}, #{exception}, #{ramek} )
